name: Predicting Employee Attrition with HR Data
description: This Jupyter Notebook generates a predictive model of employee attrition, by applying a random forest algorithm to a human resources dataset.
skills: Supervised machine learning: binary classification problem
pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, scikit-learn, and ipywidgets libraries

name: Working From Home After COVID-19
description: This data project consists of several notebooks working with a dataset created from a global survey of attitudes regarding working from home (WFH). It includes data reduction, data cleaning, and data wrangling. The resultant dataset is then used to predict a WFH employee's likelihood of returning to their worksite after COVID-19.
skills: Supervised machine learning: multiclass classification problem
pandas, matplotlib, scikit-learn, and imbalanced-learn libraries

name: Sentiment Analysis of Moby Dick
description: This Jupyter Notebook makes use of the natural language toolkit to explore the content and sentiment of the book 'Moby Dick.' The analysis includes examining the structure of the book, the most frequently used words, and the sentiment of each chapter.
